comment.author: 40499661@N00
comment._content: With the Australian PM having just said "the China-Australia relationship is always full of challenges and can I say it always has been thus and it will be thus for quite a long time to come," it's fascinating to see just how far back the "official" relationship between Australia and China extends.

comment.author: 30207865@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Photografica, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
